about_the_game:
The Pre-Order Bonus Pack features a power-up item and an accessory to customize your Survivor on the battlefield!

Need to escape the Raider? No fear! Use the Android 18 Transphere to borrow a special skill to aid in your escape.

Add to your outfit with the Classic Blue scouter and take on the powerful foe that lies ahead.

The Pre-Order Bonus Pack contains:
- Android 18 Transphere
Skill: Wall Kick
Super Attack: Full Power Energy Blast Volley
- Accessory
Classic Scouter (Blue)
detailed_description:
The Pre-Order Bonus Pack features a power-up item and an accessory to customize your Survivor on the battlefield!

Need to escape the Raider? No fear! Use the Android 18 Transphere to borrow a special skill to aid in your escape.

Add to your outfit with the Classic Blue scouter and take on the powerful foe that lies ahead.

The Pre-Order Bonus Pack contains:
- Android 18 Transphere
Skill: Wall Kick
Super Attack: Full Power Energy Blast Volley
- Accessory
Classic Scouter (Blue)

name: DRAGON BALL: THE BREAKERS - Pre-Order Bonus Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 or AMD Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 or Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The Pre-Order Bonus Pack features a power-up item and an accessory to customize your Survivor on the battlefield!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
